A Loss For Words are coming to town!
Rise Record's Massachusetts pop punks hit The Fighting Cocks, just before they play the UK leg of the Warped Tour, for a 14+ matinee show!
Support comes from Newport's finest Save Your Breath, who've played some great shows for us. The brill Decade who were last in town on the Slam Dunk Tour and new UK punks Light You Up
Tickets £10
Doors at 1pm - show finishes at 5pm 14+

Love Police welcome...
THE BLACK KEYS
THE BLACK KEYS are the hottest rock and roll act on the planet right now!
After selling out arenas all through the USA, Canada, UK and Europe and headlining Coachella and Lollapalooza and many other festivals they are very pleased to announce their long awaited return to Australia this October.
Their latest (and seventh) album ‘El Camino' is selling truckloads everywhere and its infectious opening track ‘Lonely Boy' is a certified global smash hit single and they'll be bringing all these tracks and more to Australian audiences with their electrifying new live show.
The show features huge visuals from 20 projectors, giant mirror balls, and all the hits from their deep and consistently awesome back catalogue.
The transformation of THE BLACK KEYS from a 2 piece garage band playing small clubs to being worthy headliners of arenas and festivals could not be more just or complete and proves that the pure combination of good times, great music and grit can still turn to gold.
Rest assured, you haven't see a show like this before.
THE BLACK KEYS have a deep love affair with Australia. They toured here first in 2003 just in time for the release of their second album, \\"Thickfreakness\"\". Since then they have toured here 5 more times
column5: played every major city and many regional towns multiple times
column6: as well as Bluesfest
column7: The Falls
column8: Groovin' The Moo
column9: Pyramid Rock and West Coast Blues & Roots festivals. They are loved from Darwin to Tassie
column10: from Byron Bay to Geelong. Every true music fan has a Black Keys story to tell
column11: and this October tour will be another big
column12:
big chapter.
Joining the band on all shows will be Sydney's outstanding ROYAL HEADACHE. These zeitgeist-straddling purveyors of DIY garage soul are the most exciting musical thing happening in our country right now. Their debut self titled album of last year was highly loved and rated by all from the 'burbs to the inner city hipsters. Get there early to experience and believe their power. "

KEXP, STG and Starbucks join our Seattle-loving hearts to bring you Little Big Show, a concert series created to benefit our city’s arts organizations.
Four times a year, we find a great band or two, give ‘em the stage at The Neptune and donate 100% of ticket sales to a local non-profit. It’s the little show with a big effect.
Previous shows, featuring performances by Pickwick, Real Estate and Dum Dum Girls raised over $28,000 for Arts Corps, Coyote Central and NFFTY. Let’s round out the year for our new beneficiary, 826 Seattle – a writing and tutoring center.
To learn more about 826 Seattle and the difference you will be making by attending this show, please visit http://826seattle.org/.
Tickets on sale Friday

First Aid Kit:
Bittersweet is the word the Söderberg sisters prefer. “We like bittersweet songs
column6: songs that affect you differently depending on how you interpret them
column7: ” says Klara
column8: the younger of the Swedish siblings that make up First Aid Kit. “Making the melodies and lyrics head in different directions is very deliberate
column9: ” adds big sister Johanna. “A song like ‘Emmylou’ sounds cheerful
column10: but the lyrics are the saddest thing you ever heard.” First Aid Kit’s first US-recorded album
column11: The Lion’s Roar
column12: juxtaposes sadness and beauty in the best traditions of folk and country music. They even cite the Louvin Brothers’ cheerfully brutal version of the old murder ballad “Knoxville Girl” as the perfect example of the sweet and sour they adore. And this new carefully constructed collection deftly succeeds in setting references to their hometown of Stockholm and long
column13: dark Scandinavian winters against a backdrop of country-rock swing. Initially signed in 2008 by The Knife-owned label Rabid Records (they are now signed to Wichita)
column14: First Aid Kit have gone from faraway teenage fans covering Fleet Foxes for fun to recording a Blue Series 7-Inch single of Buffy Sainte-Marie’s “Universal Soldier” with Jack White at his request in his Nashville
column15: TN Third Man Studios. “I think of it now as like a dream
column16: too good to be true
column18: happily and hurriedly squeezed into last autumn’s tour schedule. Where 2010’s debut The Big Black and the Blue was starkly intimate
column19: The Lion’s Roar
column20: recorded in Omaha by Mike Mogis (Bright Eyes
column21: millions more)
column22: is a full band record. The girls’ father Benkt takes the bass
column23: Mattias Bergqvist drums
column24: while Mogis and Nate Walcott of Bright Eyes
column25: and a cast of Omaha-based musicians round out the sound. From the dynamic title track onwards
column26: the album is a rich and stirring affair that expands upon the keen and sophisticated country-tinged pop of their debut. “Emmylou” name-checks such greats as Gram Parsons
column29: and of course Ms. Harris
column30: yet for all its upbeat appeal
column31: it recognizes the sadness in the lives and art of these heroes. “We’ve listened to those people for a very long time. We hadn’t even toured America when we started writing that song
column32: ” confesses Johanna. “We actually finished it in Australia
column34: timeless “In The Hearts Of Men” adds mellotron alongside more expected textures. “My duality awakes
column35: ” sings Klara in the lush
column36: knowing “I Found a Way”. The exquisite “Dance to Another Tune” perfectly conjures a haunting sense of unease
column38: steady cadence of “This Old Routine” tells a plaintive
column39: yet redemptive
column40: tale of loves lost and re-found. “To A Poet” opens side two
column41: so to speak
column42: and its elegant coda
column43: featuring a string quartet arranged by Walcott
column44: particularly impressed the Söderbergs. “We recorded our last record at home. We couldn’t even have fit them all in
column45: ” says Klara. Despite its lonesome sound
column46: “New Year’s Eve” – all distant reverb and atmospherics – is “actually very hopeful”. Finally the exuberant hoedown of ‘King of the World’ features The Felice Brothers
column47: just passing through town during the session
column48: and local hero Conor Oberst
column49: who sings the last verse. “We’d never worked with a producer before
column50: ” says Johanna. “Yet we never disagreed with Mike about anything.” The resulting record is serious fun
column51: yet First Aid Kit are only starting. “We want to work in music forever. Our voices and songs could work in many genres
column52: ” says Johanna
column53: “We don’t know how we’ll sound in ten years time.” But which do they prefer singing
column54: sad or happy songs? They roar with laughter. “We only sing sad songs.” There will never be a shortage of those
column55: and in First Aid Kit’s hands
column56: they will always sound nothing short of glorious. "

De Amerikaanse producer Chris Dexter Greenspan is onder zijn pseudoniem oOoOO (spreek uit: ‘oh’) één van de bekendste en meest besproken muzikanten binnen het jonge genre witch house/chill wave. Dit genre - een hit onder vooraanstaande Amerikaanse bloggers - is een intrigerende mix van hiphop, r&b, house en top 40-pop. Muziek waarin de geest van de jaren 80 een benevelde dronkenmansdans uitvoert.
In het voorprogramma de dromerige pop en Caribische percussie van de Amsterdamse band Moon & Sun.

LACUNA COIL are bringing their Dark Legacy tour to the UK later this year which will be the band’s only headlining run in the UK for 2012. The shows will feature a set of more than two hours. Frontwoman Cristina Scabbia commented: “The Dark Legacy tour is a dream come true! This tour will present the history of Lacuna Coil, melding old fans with a new generation of Coilers. The Dark Legacy set will offer both the electric and acoustic vibe and absolute melodic epicness!”
Frontman Andrea Ferro added, “We wanted to give our fans a special present for Lacuna Coil’s fifteenth anniversary and that was the inspiration for the Dark Legacy tour. The Dark Legacy show will be very special, with a lot of our history in a surprise-filled set. You won’t want to miss it!”

Set times (from Scala):
Fixers - 8:30
Summer Camp - 9:30
--------------------
After selling out Efes, Summer Camp return to London's Scala for their biggest headline show to date.
One of the most enduring qualities of music lies in its ability to be transportative - the very best songs can take you, almost instantly, to a specific moment in time, or perhaps a particular location, even evoke a specific emotion. It is an immutable relationship we have with the music we listen to, and it is one which the London duo of Elizabeth Sankey and Jeremy Warmsley, aka Summer Camp realise so perfectly, crafting twinkling, pristine pop gems which sound as though they could have been discovered in a trunk in an attic, glinting and glittering like jewels at the bottom of the sea.

TRIVIUM‘s latest album, “In Waves”, sold 22,000 copies in the United States in its first week of release to land at position No. 13 on The Billboard 200 chart — the highest U.S. chart entry of the band’s career. The group’s previous CD, “Shogun”, opened with just under 24,000 units back in October 2008 to debut at No. 23. The effort followed up “The Crusade”, which registered a first-week tally of 31,000 copies in October 2006 to enter the chart at No. 25.
“In Waves” was recorded primarily at Paint It Black Studios in Orlando, Florida (with only the drums having been tracked at Audiohammer Studios in Sanford, Florida) with the production/mixing team of Colin Richardson (MACHINE HEAD, BULLET FOR MY VALENTINE, SLIPKNOT, FEAR FACTORY) and Martin “Ginge” Ford, along with engineer Carl Bown. A two-disc special edition is also available. It features five bonus tracks, plus a DVD with a 40-minute, behind-the-scenes documentary, as well as an exclusive concert filmed in a warehouse located in Orlando, Florida, which is the band’s stomping grounds. This concert features the first performances of tracks from “In Waves”, along with TRIVIUM classics.
AS I LAY DYING entered the studio last month to begin recording its new CD for a late 2012 release via Metal Blade Records. The CD is being helmed by Bill Stevenson, who has played drums for both the DESCENDENTS and BLACK FLAG and is one of the most highly renowned producers in rock. His production credits include work on records by RISE AGAINST, NOFX, PROPAGANDHI, THE CASUALTIES, ANTI-FLAG and many more.
Source: http://metalshockfinland.wordpress.com/ "

column4:
Na The Invisible City, het concert van Paume afgelopen december, borduurt Paume nu verder op het thema de stad. In The Tidal City staat de groei en krimp van de stad centraal. Op het programma staan: Electro-Harmonics, een live improvisatiesessie waarin muzikanten elektronische en akoestische muziek laten samengaan, twee lezingen waarin de (on)mogelijkheden van de eb en vloed beweging in de urbane omgeving worden besproken en de gelauwerde (geluids)kunstenaar en grafisch vormgever Stefan Hanser. Hij presenteert een reeks werken waarin de focus ligt op de snelle stedelijke en industriële ontwikkelingen in het moderne China. Hanser trekt, zoals van hem verwacht mag worden, een ambiente en dronenende sonische architectuur op die het hedendaagse urbane China onmiddellijk binnenbrengt in Huis aan de Werf.
Anemone Tube – field recordings / drone / ambient
'Electro-Harmonics’ II – een live electro-akoestische improvisatie sessie (Met Machinefabriek - electronica, Martijn Pieck - electronica, Tobias Klein - basklarinet en Oscar Strik - percussie)
Hans Karssenberg (STIPO) – lezing / discussie
Theo Ploeg (freelance (muziek)journalist en urbaan socioloog) – lezing / discussie
Kaartverkoop via www.muziekweek.nl of via deze link: http://utrechtsuitburo.activetickets.com/ProgrammaDetail.aspx?id=212430&mid=38
prijs: € 12
column6: - (student
column7: cjp
column8: u-pas) "

A creepy crawly electronic jazz combo
column5: creating soundtracks for non-existing movies  Dark
column6: exotic and mysterious. Fusing analog and digital flawlessly
column7:
giving them a totally unique and original sound. Film Noir futurism.
The Kilimanjaro Darkjazz Ensemble (TKDE) formed in 2000 as a project to compose new music for existing silent movies. Jason Köhnen and Gideon Kiers
column8: both graduates of the Utrecht School of Arts
column9: combined their audio and visual skills to reinterpret classic movies by F.W. Murnau (Nosferatu) and F. Langs (Metropolis). In 2004
column10: UK trombonist Hilary Jeffery and Swiss cellist Nina Hitz joined TKDE to record the self-titled debut album which was released on Planet Mu Records in May 2006. The ensuing tour saw Eelco Bosman and Paris based vocalist Charlotte Cegarra join
column11:
forming the Ensemble into a sextet. London based violinist Sadie Anderson joined in 2008 to supply the group with extra power on stage.
The Netherlands has been TKDE’s homebase since 2007
column12: while members have moved closer to each other to make composing and producing easier. Apart from the mothership which is TKDE
column13: there is another entity The Mount Fuji Doomjazz Corporation is a live improv jazz/drone/doom sideproject consisting of TKDE members and a host of interchanging guest musicians. Due to the vast possibilities within the band
column14: the sound spectrum of TKDE is hard to capture within one specific composition. Moreover
column15:
the project will lean towards various styles depending on the respective members working together at a given time. A good mix between atmosphere and technique is always the strong basis for a TKDE composition.
Live TKDE fuse analog and digital as much as possible. Combining traditional instrumentations (comprising cello
column16: trombone
column18: beats
column19: guitar
column20: bass and vocals) with existing and/or self-developed software
column21: continuously blending and mutating
column22: creating an organic and electronic performance
column23:
supported by visuals which add to and interact with the frequencies of said instruments.
Apart from the mothership which is TKDE
column24:
there is another entity The Mount Fuji Doomjazz Corporation is a live improv jazz/drone/doom sideproject consisting of TKDE members and a host of interchanging guest musicians.
The Kilimanjaro Darkjazz Ensemble are:
Jason Köhnen – Bass

Heidenfest 2012 zagości w Krakowie!
Po wyjątkowo udanej zeszłorocznej edycji wygląda na to, iż Heidenfest na stałe wejdzie do metalowego kalendarza koncertowego w Polsce. Folk metalowa trasa roku będzie miała jeden przystanek w Polsce – 28 października w krakowskim klubie „Studio”.
Headlinerem trasy jest WINTERSUN, którego wydana w 2004 roku płyta „Wintersun” została sprzedana w rekordowym dla tego gatunku muzyki nakładzie - ponad 100,000 kopii w Europie. Zespół cały czas pracuje nad nowym albumem, który ujrzy światło dzienne późnym latem tego roku.
Głównym supportem będzie doskonale znany KORPIKLAANI, który ma już na koncie niezapomniane występy w Polsce m. in. na Przystanku Woodstock.
Na deskach krakowskiego Studia zobaczymy również VARG, TROLLFEST oraz KRAMPUS.
Heidenfest 2012
WINTERSUN
KORPIKLAANI
VARG
TROLLFEST
KRAMPUS

column4:
A Dream Theater több mint 25 éve műveli, vezeti és szórakoztatja a közönségét. Töretlen sikerükről és fogyhatatlan energiájukról a hazai rajongók is megbizonyosodhatnak 2012. február 17-én, a Papp László Budapest Sportarénában. A 2011. szeptember 13-án megjelenő 11. stúdióalbummal, az A Dramatic Turn of Events című lemezzel ismételten formálja majd ízlésünket a legendás zenekar. A korong szívből megélt hangképeknek az összessége, és méltó utódja az olyan mérföldkőnek számító korábbi Dream Theater lemezeknek, mint az Images and Words vagy a Scenes from a Memory. A Dream Theater az új dobos, Mike Mangini érkezésével új erőre kapott, a tagok egymásnak és a rajongóknak való elkötelezettsége erősebb, mint valaha. Mindannyian egyetértenek abban, hogy az A Dramatic Turn of Events az egyik legjobban sikerült Dream Theater album.
A progresszív metál nem kimondottan az a stílus, ami széles körben népszerű lenne a zenekedvelők körében, a Dream Theater mégis világszerte már több, mint 8 millió lemezt adott el. Ez leginkább annak a legendás státusznak köszönhető, amit teljesen újszerű hangjukkal és lenyűgöző virtuozitásukkal sikerült kiérdemelniük.
A Dream Theater vendége a Periphery nevezetű zenekar lesz.
A koncertre Meet&Greet csomagok a következő linken érhetők el:
http://vipnation.com/programs/dream-theater
Jegyek 2011. szeptember 12-től kaphatók a Ticket Express jegyirodákban és az Eventim hálózatában. www.tex.hu
www.dreamtheater.net
JEGYÁRAK: 15.500 - 7.500 HUF "

column4:
22 января в клубе RE:PUBLIC состоится выступление легендарного шведского музыканта Питера Андерссона (aka Лина Бэби Долл) и его культового проекта DEUTSCH NEPAL, одного из самых ярких явлений современной европейской индустриальной сцены и патриарха культового лейбла Cold Meat Industry. Лина Бэби Долл представит беларусам свой новый (и лучший на данный момент!) альбом Amygdala, открывая январским концертом в Минске европейский тур, приуроченный к 20-летию творческой карьеры DEUTSCH NEPAL. Вместе с Линой Бэби Долл на сцену поднимутся: старейший беларусский dark ambient проект UDUMBAL (альтер эго PRAGNAVIT), петербуржцы CYCLOFYDEA, а также гомельский military-pop коллектив SVALBARD, который представит минчанам свой второй полноформатный альбом, выпущенный недавно в Германии на лейбле Lichterklang.
Выступление DEUTSCH NEPAL обещает стать одним из самых ярких событий последних лет для всех беларусских ценителей экспериментальной электронной музыки - ведь до сих пор нашу страну ни разу не посещали музыканты, чьи альбомы украшают каталоги таких культовых лейблов как Cold Meat Industry, Staalplaat Records, Ant Zen, TESCO и Old Europa Cafe!

To celebrate finishing their new album, Keane have decided to play a special show at a venue close to the band's heart: the De La Warr Pavilion in Bexhill-on-Sea, East Sussex. The show is on Friday, 9th March 2012 and the band will unveil several brand new songs (alongside some old favourites).
Tickets for this exclusive performance cost £25. There is a special pre-sale for km.com users, beginning at 9am on Thursday, 19th January from keanemusic.com/tickets. The general sale tickets will then be available from 10am on Saturday, 21st January from keanemusic.com/tickets and gigsandtours.com and in person from the De La Warr box office. The band will be supported on the night by Hoodlums. The show is open to those aged 14+ (under 16s must be accompanied by an adult). Max of four tickets per order. Doors 7.30pm.
Bexhill-on-Sea is located on the East Sussex coast midway between Brighton and Folkestone. The town has a train station, with regular services to London, Brighton and Ashford.

The Experimental Tropic Blues Band is een band die zichzelf als doel heeft gesteld om in de voetsporen te treden van de grote namen van de rock 'n roll: Johnny Cash, the Cramps, Elvis, Bo Diddley. Hoewel ze niet uit een zeer opwindend land komen (Belgie) staan ze er wel om bekend om er live een enorm spektakel van te maken. Na tien jaar lang optreden en meer dan 400 shows in Europa en de US, en na het uitbrengen van 1 e.p. en 2 l.p.'s, heeft de band hun meest recente plaat met niemand minder dan Jon Spencer in New York opgenomen. Het album, Liquid Love, komt uit bij Excelsior en wordt vanavond in EKKO gepresenteerd.
Het Utrechtse Let's Go Eskimo zal de support verzorgen en ook zij hebben een feestje te vieren. Vanavond komen zij in EKKO hun nieuwe ep 'Stepping in Line' presenteren.

Disappears + Booze
£8 adv / £10
Drawing on a combined reverence for reverb, heavy tremolo, distortion, delay and repetition, Disappears play minimal rock music inspired by everything from Kraut to American gospel to punk. Carving out a space somewhere in the middle of garage-punk snarl, shoegaze haze, and Krautrock grooves, Chicago’s Disappears features Brian Case (also of the Ponys and 90 Day Men), Boas members Graeme Gibson and Jonathan van Herik, and Damon Carruesco. The band started when Case’s other groups were on hiatus and he was recording demos with Gibson Gibson brought van Herik into the project, and in turn, van Herik brought Carruesco into the fold. Soon after forming, the band self-released a series of 7” singles with artwork based on Can’s album Delay 1968, and made their material available for free on the Internet. Disappears began recording their debut studio album and signed to Touch & Go, appearing at the label’s showcase at 2009’s South by Southwest Festival, and also playing dates with Tortoise, Deerhunter, and Times New Viking. The band released 100 CD-Rs of Live Over the Rainbo, a live album from the Deerhunter/Times New Viking tour, that was eventually distributed by Plus Tapes and Rococco Records later in 2009. Disappears continued to play more high-profile Chicago shows, including a gig at the Pitchfork Music Festival and a 2009 New Year’s Eve show with the Jesus Lizard. Late in the year, the band moved to Kranky Records, who released their official debut album Lux in 2010. The band also recorded a single with Sonic Youth’s Steve Shelley and the noise duo White/Light.

# MAMIFFER (Us, Hydra Head)
A la croisée de l'ambient, de la musique concrète et des expérimentations drone d'un de ses éminents membres (Aaron Turner ex-ISIS, Old Man Gloom, Lotus Eater etc.), MAMIFFER peint des paysages aux nuances sombres hantés par un piano aux lignes mélancoliques.

column4:
V pátek 20.1.2012 se v Galerii Divus uskuteční pod hlavičkou Cut Hands exkluzivní performance legendy extrémní elektroniky a jednoho ze zakladatelů žánru power electronics, Williama Bennetta, leadera amerických Whitehouse. O roli domácího supportu se postará projekt S/M a Dj Aitcher Clark v Vjem Pleionem!
William Bennet’s Cut Hands
Nestor extremní elektroniky William Bennett se proslavil hlavně založením a následným působením v legendárních Whitehouse
column5: jedné z nejextrémnějších power electronics skupin vůbec. K šokujícímu vyznění Whitehouse přispěl posléze v devadesátých letech i spisovatel Peter Sotos
column6:
který obohatil výrazové prostředky Whitehouse o svou celoživotní obsesi – patologii masových vražd a násilných trestných činů.
Projekt Cut Hands představuje výrazně rytmičtější tvář tvorby Williama Bennetta. Mezi stěžejní kompoziční složky patří zejména tradiční hudba afrického kontinentu smíchaná s rytmickou elektronikou
column7: post industriálně laděnými pasážemi a psychedelickým oparem 60tých a 70tých let. Celkové vyznění skladeb Cut Hands je výrazně temné se zřetelem k bicím a rytmickým nástrojům
column8:
jejichž aranže nemají daleko k aranžím projektů jako Z’EV či ranějším Einstürzende Neubauten. Projekt byl vydán na Williamově vlastním labelu Susan Lawly.
S/M
O roli domácího supportu se postará počtem proměnlivé trio S/M
column9: tvořené jednotkami A
column10: S
column11: J. Počátky tohoto souboru sahají až k počátkům české industriální/extremně elektronické scény
column12: kdy vycházejí jako přímá emanace legendárních Suicidal Meditations. Od doby svého vzniku se S/M představili na bezpočtu festivalů jako Alternativa
column13:
Pražském Bienale či Prague Industrial Festival. Těšit se můžete na dark ambient/industriálně improvizovanou experimentální hudbu podbarvenou rozličnými výrazovými prostředky.
Po celý večer přispějí k výborné atmosféře i Dj Aitcher Clark a Vj Pleione mixem sahajícím od ambientně/industriálního minimálu až po rytmicky laděné tracky. Těšit se můžete i na výrazně posílený sound systém
column14:
HD video projekci a hlavně krásné prostředí galerie Divus v budově KC Vltavská.
Koncert začíná ve 20:00. Vstupné činí 250 Kč. "

column4:
MONOCLE
Monocle are a dreamy pop group from Brooklyn. Both melancholy and breezy, they pull together bossa nova, pastoral ambience, and 70's film soundtracks with a driving and sweet pop undercurrent. They are performing live in London for this one show as they compl...ete work on their newest recording, Transpacific Sound Paradise.
http://www.facebook.com/MonocleTheBand
HONG KONG IN THE SIXTIES
Hong Kong in The 60s present their vision of song
column5: reminding us of forgotten sounds like The Passage
column6: Young Marble Giants and Robert Wyatt
column7:
as well as the debt we all owe gentle pop. The melodies are sung with the perfect balance of honesty and control… the control is so welcome.
http://hongkonginthe60s.com/

Emotive and melancholic synth pop that point towards the eccentricity of artists like Snakefinger and Tuxedomoon

column9:

London/Berlin-based record label Erased Tapes celebrates five years of fusing classical and contemporary music. To recognise this milestone, Erased Tapes label founder Robert Raths has set up a number of events and releases for this year. After two sold out label nights at The Great Escape Festival and the AB in Brussels in May, October will see a full Erased Tapes 5th Anniversary Tour, which will bring three of their leading artists – Nils Frahm, Ólafur Arnalds, A Winged Victory For The Sullen plus special guests – through Europe's capital cities.

jan vr 27 Aux Raus XL – Avond – Afscheidsoptreden met live: Aux Raus, T. Raumschmiere (solo, live act), Joost van Bellen, Adolf Butler, Dick El Demasiado, Vrouwen Zijn Okee
Voorverkoop vanaf 3 december
AANVANG 20.30 UUR ZAAL OPEN 20.00 UUR ENTREE 12,50 excl. lidmaatschap (3,50 p.m. / 25,- p.j.)
Het afscheidsconcert van Doe Maar in 1984 is hoogstwaarschijnlijk het meest memorabele laatste optreden uit de Nederlandse popgeschiedenis, maar Aux Raus gaat daar verandering in proberen te brengen. Tijdens het avond- en nachtvullende programma rondom het allerlaatste concert van de Amsterdamse gabberpunkers zullen vele bevriende artiesten naast en met Aux Raus zorgen voor een legendarisch laatste hoofdstuk aan een reeds scabreuze geschiedenis. Bier, blote billen met een microfoon ertussen en nieuwe vormen van pogo en pit: \\"De optredens van Aux Raus zijn altijd een heuse happening maar na meer dan vijhonderd optredens in acht jaar is de koek bijna op. Op het moment trekt het gabberpunkduo nog één keer door het land en vanavond treden ze voor de allerlaatste keer op. De reden voor dit einde kan niet beter verwoord worden dan door het duo zelf: Toen we elkaar na onze studie weer ontmoetten op een feestje en in een dronken bui besloten eens te proberen wat muziek samen te maken
column5: hadden we niet in kunnen denken dat we 8 jaar
column6: 3 albums en meer dan 500 optredens in 18 verschillende landen later pas weer zouden besluiten dat het wel mooi geweest zou zijn. We hebben heel veel vrienden gemaakt
column7: veel lol gehad en heel veel mensen een toffe avond bezorgd en nu is het tijd voor verandering en nieuwe projecten. We wilden met Aux Raus een band beginnen die met humor
column8: veel ideeën en veel energie zelfs van een begrafenis een feestje kan maken en we hebben er erg van genoten.Dit najaar spelen we onze allerlaatste tour door Nederland en we hopen dat iedereen die ons nog eens wilt zien mee komt feesten. We kijken met een brede lach terug op een fantastische periode en willen iedereen die ons gesteund heeft
column9: bier heeft gegooid of zijn enkels verzwikt heeft in een pit ergens in een bierschuur in de provincie hartelijk bedanken. Hou het hard!\"\" Bastiaan Bosma en Luuk Bouwman
column10:
Aux Raus.
Aux Raus zal het de laatste avond en nacht niet alleen doen. Ze zullen worden gesteund door een bonte verzameling bevriende artiesten zoals: T. Raumschmiere
column11: Joost van Bellen
column13:
de Latijns-Amerikaanse cultheld Dick El Demasiado en de nieuwe damespunkband Vrouwen Zijn Okee met teksten als: “Ik hoor thuis achter het fornuis” en “Heb je haar op je kut ja/nee”.
Aux Raus T. Raumschmiere Joost Van Bellen Adolf Butler Dick El Demasiado Vrouwen Zijn Okee "

column4:
jan vr 27 Aux Raus XL – Avond – Afscheidsoptreden met live: Aux Raus, T. Raumschmiere (solo, live act), Joost van Bellen, Adolf Butler, Dick El Demasiado, Vrouwen Zijn Okee
Voorverkoop vanaf 3 december
AANVANG 20.30 UUR ZAAL OPEN 20.00 UUR ENTREE 12,50 excl. lidmaatschap (3,50 p.m. / 25,- p.j.)
Het afscheidsconcert van Doe Maar in 1984 is hoogstwaarschijnlijk het meest memorabele laatste optreden uit de Nederlandse popgeschiedenis, maar Aux Raus gaat daar verandering in proberen te brengen. Tijdens het avond- en nachtvullende programma rondom het allerlaatste concert van de Amsterdamse gabberpunkers zullen vele bevriende artiesten naast en met Aux Raus zorgen voor een legendarisch laatste hoofdstuk aan een reeds scabreuze geschiedenis. Bier, blote billen met een microfoon ertussen en nieuwe vormen van pogo en pit: \\"De optredens van Aux Raus zijn altijd een heuse happening maar na meer dan vijhonderd optredens in acht jaar is de koek bijna op. Op het moment trekt het gabberpunkduo nog één keer door het land en vanavond treden ze voor de allerlaatste keer op. De reden voor dit einde kan niet beter verwoord worden dan door het duo zelf: Toen we elkaar na onze studie weer ontmoetten op een feestje en in een dronken bui besloten eens te proberen wat muziek samen te maken
column5: hadden we niet in kunnen denken dat we 8 jaar
column6: 3 albums en meer dan 500 optredens in 18 verschillende landen later pas weer zouden besluiten dat het wel mooi geweest zou zijn. We hebben heel veel vrienden gemaakt
column7: veel lol gehad en heel veel mensen een toffe avond bezorgd en nu is het tijd voor verandering en nieuwe projecten. We wilden met Aux Raus een band beginnen die met humor
column8: veel ideeën en veel energie zelfs van een begrafenis een feestje kan maken en we hebben er erg van genoten.Dit najaar spelen we onze allerlaatste tour door Nederland en we hopen dat iedereen die ons nog eens wilt zien mee komt feesten. We kijken met een brede lach terug op een fantastische periode en willen iedereen die ons gesteund heeft
column9: bier heeft gegooid of zijn enkels verzwikt heeft in een pit ergens in een bierschuur in de provincie hartelijk bedanken. Hou het hard!\"\" Bastiaan Bosma en Luuk Bouwman
column10:
Aux Raus.
Aux Raus zal het de laatste avond en nacht niet alleen doen. Ze zullen worden gesteund door een bonte verzameling bevriende artiesten zoals: T. Raumschmiere

column4:
Two Fresh:
Combining an array of influences and a diverse musical background, Two Fresh’s sound is difficult to describe but impossible to ignore. Built on a foundation of instrumental hip hop, their music seamlessly incorporates elements of sampling, a tight low end and catchy synth lines, with a strong beat always at the cornerstone.
Two Fresh on Twitter
@twofreshbeats
Two fresh Blog
http://TwoFreshBeats.com
Two Fresh on Facebook
www.facebook.com/twofreshbeats
Nit Grit:
The dubstep electronic genre has emerged as a force in the United States
column5: and no one embodies its momentum more than San Jose based artist NiT GriT. One of the most prolific and hardworking of the new field of dubstep/grime performers
column6: his current music was formed in his home turf of the Bay area from a background in glitch
column7: idm
column8: and breakcore
column9: and is set apart by its soulfulness and melody. True to the trend towards dramatic entrances in so many of the new fraternity of sensational dubstep artists
column10:
NiT GriT burst on the scene with his first show in March 2010 in a co-billing with Excision.
NiT GRiT on Twitter
@nitgritmusic
NiT GRiT official Site - all albums are available for free download
www.nitgrit.com
NiT GRiT on Facebook
www.facebook.com/nitgrit "

column4: 8 laptops, 3 turntables, 6 keyboards, 4 drum machines, a Theremin, live onstage productionThe Cannabinoids represent a musical exploration of the science of addiction. It's the sensational reaction created when the synthetic combines with the organic, and The Cannabinoids are the receptors that bind the experience. The project was originally conceived when Erykah Badu sought to manifest live musical improvisation utilizing the tools of studio tracking and hip-hop production.

Präsentiert von: SAX Das Dresdner Stadtmagazin
Do 27.09.12 A Place To Bury Strangers (USA)
www.aplacetoburystrangers.com
www.myspace.com/aplacetoburystrangers
\"\"Kein Produzent hat uns erschaffen. Wir sind dafür nicht in die Schule gegangen und wir haben keine Zeit für Gebrauchsanweisungen. Wir haben dies hier erfunden. Jetzt teilen wir es mit euch.\"\"
Die lauteste Band New Yorks ist zurück! Man möchte den Regler auf halbe Kraft stellen
column5: weil es einem die Ohren wegbläst. A Place To Bury Strangers aus Brooklyn haben ihr neuestes Werk \"\"Worship\"\" selbst produziert herausgekommen ist der hypnotisierende Sound einer Band
column6: die alles unter Kontrolle hat und deren Musik alle Grenzen sprengt. Oder: Sind sie zu stark
column7: bist du zu schwach! Verstörend verzerrte Gitarren inmitten von melodischem Krach
column8: dann wieder absolut tanzbare Beats - ein Hörerlebnis zwischen 60's-Loops
column9: bedrohlich-atmosphärischer Stimmung und einer Lautstärkewahrnehmung in völlig neuer Dimension. Etwas Großartiges kündigt sich an! Bald kann man das Ganze auch live erleben
column10:
wenn die Band um Oliver Ackermann im September für einige Konzerte nach Deutschland kommt.
Video: \"\"You Are The One\"\" www.youtube.com/watch?v=0-o4h-GFUqQ
Aktuelles Album: \"\"Worship\"\"
Label: Dead Oceans
Support: GAFFA GHANDI (D)
www.gaffaghandi.bandcamp.com
Einlass: 20:00 Uhr
Beginn: 21:00 Uhr
Tickets: www.eventim.de
column11: www.x-why-z.eu
column13: sowie in allen bekannten Vorverkaufsstellen. "

To EJEKT Festival επιστρέφει για 8η συνεχή χρονιά με ένα από τα κορυφαία line-ups που έχουν παρουσιαστεί ποτέ στην Ελλάδα. Πιστό στην συνταγή του να παρουσιάζει τα μεγαλύτερα ονόματα από την ροκ και dance μουσική στην ίδια σκηνή, το EJEKT 2012 και φέτος θα είναι το σημείο συνάντησης όλων των μουσικόφιλών της χώρας.
.
Tα δύο πρώτα ονόματα του φετινού line-up είναι οι Kasabian και οι Katzenjammer.
Οι Kasabian, το μεγαλύτερο rock συγκρότημα που έβγαλε η Μεγάλη Βρετανία την τελευταία δεκαπενταετία και ένα από τα μεγαλύτερα απωθημένα του ελληνικού κοινού, επιτέλους θα εμφανιστούν για πρώτη φορά στην Ελλάδα!
.
Οι δίσκοι τους έχουν γίνει πολυπλατινένιοι, τα singles τους παίζονται ασταμάτητα στο ραδιόφωνο, οι εμφανίσεις τους έχουν κερδίσει επάξια τον τίτλο του \\"κορυφαίου live act\"\" και τα πλέον έγκριτα μουσικά περιοδικά (Mojo

Tycho is de muzikale uitlaatklep van artistieke veelvraat Scott Hansen uit San Francisco. Als fotograaf en grafisch ontwerper scoort hij al enige tijd met zijn blog ISO50, muzikaal zet hij in 2011 de puntjes op de 'i' dankzij een uiterst intrigerende plaat. 'Dive' zwemt in dromerige electropop en Hansen kan op de plaat zijn fascinatie voor oude synths helemaal botvieren. Hij werkt ook graag met live instrumenten die hij zorgvuldig samplet om er vervolgens fijn uitgekiende sferen mee op te roepen. Tycho is onmiskenbaar beïnvloed door Boards Of Canada en Bibio maar houdt eerder vast aan songstructuren dan uitdeinende moody soundscapes. Het artwork van de plaat is ongelooflijk mooi en sfeervol en wordt - hoe kan het ook anders - door Scott Hansen zelf gemaakt. Op Pitchfork wordt de plaat heel goed ontvangen, bij HUMO verwoorden ze het als volgt: 'In het hersenkamertje waar wij onze mentale notities bewaren hangt sinds vorige week een verse fluogele Post-it. Die moet ons, de eerstvolgende keer dat we over Highway 1 langs de Amerikaanse westkust slingeren, de Stille Oceaan in onze ooghoek, eraan herinneren 'Dive' van Tycho op endless repeat te zetten.' Heerlijke sfeermuziek dus om volledig bij weg te dromen!
Ansatz Der Maschine is het muzikale geesteskind van de uit Kortrijk afkomstige componist, altviolist en elektronica-artiest Mathijs Bertel. Met de ietwat abstracte maar ideeënrijke langspelers 'The Postman is A Girl' en 'Painting Bad Weather on Her Body' eiste hij meteen een prominente plek op tussen Fennesz, múm, Aphex Twin, Helios, Console en andere gerenommeerde figuren uit het indietronicamilieu. Het nieuwe werkstuk 'Heat' bevat negen geslaagde composities. En hoewel elektronica en samples in de muziek nog steeds een voorname rol spelen, werd dit keer meer dan ooit voor een ambachtelijke aanpak gekozen.

Singer-songwriter Blaudzun, echte naam Johannes Sigmond, overtuigde eerder met twee prachtige albums, waarvan het alom bejubelde Seadrift Soundmachine en de daaropvolgende live shows in 2010 en 2011 voor zijn doorbraak in Nederland zorgen. Op 9 januari 2012 verschijnt opvolger Heavy Flowers (V2 Records), zijn meest dynamische langspeler tot nu toe, waarop hij zijn karakteristieke zang en meeslepende melodieën combineert met een voorliefde voor folk en artrock.
Met zijn derde collectie liedjes overtreft hij opnieuw zijn vorige werk en lijkt hij de hooggespannen verwachtingen van fans en volgers te gaan inlossen. Net als bij de vorige twee albums schreef, arrangeerde en produceerde Johannes het geheel. ‘Ik wilde eigenlijk een klassieke singer-songwriter plaat maken. Klein,sober vooral, met één gitaar of banjo. En met als thema het Einde der Tijden. Maar dat kwam er gewoon niet uit. Alles wat ik maakte, had te veel energie voor zo’n benadering. Misschien doordat ik veel heb geschreven in een periode dat ik ook veel optrad. De adrenaline van het live spelen stroomt dan ongemerkt de composities in.’
Vlak voordat Blaudzun de studio in ging, deed hij in mei 2011 nog een korte clubtour in Nederland. Sigmond: ‘Oneerbiedig gezegd heb ik daar nieuwe liedjes getest om ze vervolgens verder te bewerken en te arrangeren. Normaal werkte ik in de studio de arrangementen uit om daarna later pas te bepalen hoe ik het live wilde uitvoeren.’ Hoewel Blaudzun geen band is, heeft Johannes er wel voor gekozen om de meeste muzikanten die live met hem meedoen een rol te geven op de plaat.
Johannes speelt zelf gitaar, percussie, ukelele, banjo, bas en toetsen. Uiteraard doet ook zijn broer Jakobus zowel live als op het album mee, hij speelt gitaar en lapsteel. ‘En dat niet alleen. Hij is ook een klankbord tijdens het schrijven. Jakobus componeert ook voor zichzelf en dat houdt mij weer scherp. In één geval heb ik zelfs schaamteloos een idee van hem gejat en verwerkt in een eigen liedje.’
Popcritici en muziekfans zijn al jaren unaniem lovend over Blaudzun. Blaudzun en zijn 8-koppige band bouwden vrij snel een bijzondere live reputatie op. Sigmond schitterde o.a. tijdens Walk The Line en Into The Great Wide Open en maakt indruk op Lowlands 2010. Hij sluit het najaar van 2010 af met een zo goed als uitverkochte clubtour. Nu dus nummer drie!
Openingsact Dyzack, het legendarische eenmansorkest, komt gelukkig ook weer eens onze kant op, dus wees op tijd!

Hey! Manchester and Now Wave are delighted to be welcoming back Oklahoma’s Other Lives.
Tickets are available from Manchester University Students Union, Common (both no booking fee), Piccadilly Records, Vinyl Exchange, Seetickets.com, Ticketline.co.uk and on 0161 832 1111.
Other Lives formed as an instrumental project in 2004 under the name Kunek. Based in Stillwater, Oklahoma, Kunek (who eventually added vocals to the mix) released one album (Flight of the Flynns) before making the transition to the similarly themed Other Lives. The group’s eponymous debut album was produced and recorded by drummer/engineer Joey Waronker (Walt Mink, Beck, REM) and released in late 2008.
After getting a boost by having songs appear on Grey’s Anatomy, the band released their second album, Tamer Animals, this summer of 2011 on Play It Again Sam. They have also been asked to join Radiohead on their North America in spring 2012, having only recently finished touring with Bon Iver.
‘Thanks to the makeshift orchestra’s shaggy ringleader, Jesse Tabish, these wistful Americana-styled tracks (influenced by Tabish favourites Sigur Rós and Godspeed You! Black Emperor) rarely feel forced’ – 7.4/10, Pitchfork
‘File under Pastoral Americana alongside Fleet Foxes and Midlake, but there is a major difference: Tabish worships instrumental music, and classical minimalistsSteve Reich and Philip Glass, which accounts for the album’s pulsating orchestrations’ – BBC Music
‘This is sublime, transportive music to spend hours with’ – 4/5, the Guardian
We're pleased to announce that The Magnetic North will support. A supergroup of sorts, the project features singer-songwriter Erland Cooper (of Erland & The Carnival), Simon Tong (of The Verve) and singer/orchestral arranger Hannah Peel who have collaborated to produce Orkney: Symphony Of The Magnetic North, a new album due for release on 7 May on Full Time Hobby. It’s a beautiful, sweeping, haunting album that evokes the near-alien landscape of the Orkney Isles with drama and delicacy.
http://otherlives.com/
http://www.symphonyofthemagneticnorth.com/
http://www.heymanchester.com/
http://nowwave.co.uk/ "

THE WONDER YEARS return to The Peel
Yes The Wonder Years are back in town for the first time since the release of 'Suburbia...' - our album of the year for 2011! We love this band and can't wait to have them back at The Peel, one of the best shows of last year too!
Unfortunately I Am The Avalanche have had to pull out of their up and coming UK & Europe dates. The band will try their best to come back over the summer and will hopefully return to Kingston! Work is going on to find a suitable replacement - more info when we get it.
Support from The Swellers and Home Advantage, with tickets priced at £12.50 - http://www.banquetrecords.com/peeltwy
Please Note The Peel is a 16+ venue

La musique de Botibol (Fr) prend sa source dans l’écho sourd des souvenirs. Des premières notes sur Casiotone aux balbutiements d’un piano inondé par une crue tropicale, des trajets en voiture à observer le paysage, assis à côté des Dodos, de Chad Van Gaalen, de Sufjan Stevens, ou de Sandro Perri. Ainsi Born From A Shore, premier album sorti en février dernier, tangue constamment entre l’urgence d’un We were Foxes, l’euphorie de Friends et la mélancolie d’un Jo Cowboy. Tout ici naît d’un rivage et se disperse en particules sur une mer calme ou en plein tourment. En concert, Vincent aka Botibol est accompagné d’un batteur, et offre une dimension supplémentaire à ses compositions, entre folk dépouillé, pop cristalline et jeux harmoniques et rythmiques, jonglant avec claviers, samplers, et guitares….
www.myspace.com/botibol
La Normandie n’est pas la Californie

column4:
($15+bf)
Stonefield have announced a national tour proving once again that they’ve got their hands off the handlebars, feet in the air, full speed ahead! And since when has it been any different for these four siblings from rural Victoria?
Their last 12 months has resembled a downhill speed-race that encompassed three continents, appearances at the biggest music festivals in the UK and Australia, a cast that includes The Foo Fighters, Kaiser Chiefs and a non-stop touring schedule.
With their new single ‘Bad Reality’ in the can and awaiting a final spit and polish before being unleashed, Stonefield are in game-on mode and busily preparing to tread the boards in a way that only they can!
The Bad Reality Tour will be a non-stop East Coast rock-and-roll rollercoaster ride that will see Stonefield headlining their handpicked support cast including up and coming garage dwellers The Delta Riggs and untamed Melbourne hair-waggers Kingswood.
It’s been nine months since their previous single, the triple j Hottest 100 entrant ‘Blackwater Rising’ first hit the airwaves, and ‘Bad Reality’ is due to tear your speakers apart when it’s released in a few weeks.
Recorded by Melbourne rock Svengali Lindsay Gravina at Birdland Studio (where Gravina helped craft seminal Australian rock records by The Living End, Spiderbait, Magic Dirt, Jet and British India) it is an organ fuelled tour-de-force led by the soulful growl of Amy Findlay over a foot stomping beat.

Amerikan itärannikon hip hop -legenda Jungle Brothers saapuu keväällä Suomeen. Vuodesta 1987 toiminut rap-trio nähdään keskiviikkona 11.4. Helsingin The Venuessa ja seuraavana iltana Turun Klubilla.

Rozpiska godzinowa imprezy:
Otwarcie drzwi: 19:00
The Shiver: 19:30-19:55
Rhyme: 20:10-20:40
Juicehead: 21:00-21:40
Misfits: 22:10-23:25
Misfits często określa się mianem prekursorów horror punku, w ich twórczości można jednak odnaleźć również elementy klasycznego punk rocka czy heavy metalu. Kojarzeni przede wszystkim ze sceną punkową lat 80. stali się zespołem niemalże kultowym zarówno dzięki oprawie swoich występów, jak i charakterystycznemu stylowi, w którym podstawę stanowią skóra, kolce, grzywki (tzw. Devilock) i oczywiście makijaż!
Zespół powstał w 1977 roku w Lodi, New Jersey, z inicjatywy Glenna Danziga i Jerry’ego Only. Nazwę zapożyczyli oni od ostatniego filmu z udziałem Marilyn Monroe – „The Misfits” (czyli w polskim tłumaczeniu: „Skłóceni z życiem”). Debiutowali płytą „Walk Among Us” w 1982 roku, jednak już rok później (i po wydaniu drugiego albumu) zespół się rozpadł. Do 1995 jego założyciele walczyli o prawa do wydawania i występowania pod szyldem Misfits. W końcu to Jerry Only uzyskał prawa do nazwy zespołu, Danzig jednak zachował prawa do nagrań z lat 80. Obecnie Misfits to trio. Zespół tworzą: Jerry Only, Dez Cadena i Eric „Chupacabra” Arce. W październiku 2011 roku światło dzienne ujrzał najnowszy, siódmy już, album grupy – „The Devil’s Rain”. To właśnie w ramach promocji tej płyty Misfits odwiedzą Polskę.
http://www.misfits.com/
Serdecznie zapraszamy! "

It's often what's not said that lingers longest, and Texan four-piece This Will Destroy You realise this better than most, peppering their material with dialogue that's no slave to language, vowels or tongues.
Support comes from London five-piece Hello Mexico and electronic artist Rival Consoles

Carhartt представляет: Madlib
column5: он же — Отис Джексон-младший (Otis Jackson Jr.)
column6: чей псевдоним
column7: который в переводе расшифровывается ни много
column8: ни мало как: «Меняющие мышление сумасшедшие уроки в битах»
column9:
в представлении не нуждается. Талантливейший
диджей
column10: продюсер
column11:
рэпер и
мультиинструменталист
column12: он уже успел оказать колоссальное влияние на новое поколение битмейкеров
column13:
отдающих предпочтение фирменному абстрактному звучанию Madlib и старающихся изо всех сил следовать своему учителю. Будучи сыном известного в 60-х музыканта и
соул-певца Отиса Джексона-старшего
column14: Madlib с раннего детства проникся теплой любовью к музыке
column15: чтобы в будущем самостоятельно сделать себе имя
column16: превзойти в популярности отца и преуспеть во всех делах
column17: к которым только прикладывал руку. Дискография этого музыканта насчитывает десятки альбомов и ЕР
column18: подписанных разными именами. Известный под множеством личин
column19:
среди которых гелиумный
хип-хоп беспредел по имени Quasimoto и вымышленный джаз-ансамбльYesterday’s New Quintet
column20: он — один из самых плодовитых хип-хоп-продюсеров 2000-х. В послужном списке ярчайшего представителя культового калифорнийского лейбла Stones Throw Records сотрудничество с несметным количеством артистов таких как: Erykah Badu
column21: The Alkaholiks
column22: Mos Def
column23: De La Soul
column24: Ghostface Killah
column27:
MF DOOM (в дуэте они создали проект Madvillain) и J Dilla (с ним был создан проект Jaylib).
Madlib по праву может считаться ходячей энциклопедией современной и не очень музыки — его фонотека винила давно уже исчисляется не количеством пластинок
column28: а в весовых единицах - 4 тонны отборного материала со всех уголков земного шара. Мэдлиб не просто собирает записи — он их революционизирует. И тысячи альбомов
column29: втиснутых в трёхкомнатное пространство
column31: а функциональные инструменты огромного оркестра Мэдлиба
column33: как только это понадобится дирижёру. Единственная присущая Мэдлибу константа состоит в том
column34: что
column35: не покладая рук и не смыкая глаз
column36: он постоянно находится в работе. Помешанный на джазе он поглощён непрестанным творческим потоком
column38: что написание новых битов для него — жизненно важный процесс
column39: как прием пищи или дыхание для простых смертных. С ювелирной точностью
column40: изяществом опытного хирурга и маниакальной усердностью обезумевшего профессора
column41: Madlib вычленяет сэмплы из богом забытых мелодий и на их основе сочиняет совершенно новые композиции - всегда виртуозные и сочные
column42:
отчего по праву считается живым классиком современного битмейкинга.
16 октября Madlib выступит в Санкт — Петербурге в А2 при поддержке MC Фредди Гиббса (Freddie Gibbs) и диджея Джея Рокка (J Rocc).
Так же
column43: немаловажным фактом для оценки важности и актуальности этого концерта можно назвать и то
column44: что Madlib едет в Россию впервые
column45: и возможно — это единственный концерт здесь
column46:
который стоит у него в планах на ближайшие годы.

Carhartt представляет: Madlib
column5: он же — Отис Джексон-младший (Otis Jackson Jr.)
column6: чей псевдоним
column7: который в переводе расшифровывается ни много
column8: ни мало как: «Меняющие мышление сумасшедшие уроки в битах»
column9:
в представлении не нуждается. Талантливейший
диджей
column10: продюсер
column11:
рэпер и
мультиинструменталист
column12: он уже успел оказать колоссальное влияние на новое поколение битмейкеров
column13:
отдающих предпочтение фирменному абстрактному звучанию Madlib и старающихся изо всех сил следовать своему учителю. Будучи сыном известного в 60-х музыканта и
соул-певца Отиса Джексона-старшего
column14: Madlib с раннего детства проникся теплой любовью к музыке
column15: чтобы в будущем самостоятельно сделать себе имя
column16: превзойти в популярности отца и преуспеть во всех делах
column17: к которым только прикладывал руку. Дискография этого музыканта насчитывает десятки альбомов и ЕР
column18: подписанных разными именами. Известный под множеством личин
column19:
среди которых гелиумный
хип-хоп беспредел по имени Quasimoto и вымышленный джаз-ансамбльYesterday’s New Quintet
column20: он — один из самых плодовитых хип-хоп-продюсеров 2000-х. В послужном списке ярчайшего представителя культового калифорнийского лейбла Stones Throw Records сотрудничество с несметным количеством артистов таких как: Erykah Badu
column21: The Alkaholiks
column22: Mos Def
column23: De La Soul
column24: Ghostface Killah
column27:
MF DOOM (в дуэте они создали проект Madvillain) и J Dilla (с ним был создан проект Jaylib).
Madlib по праву может считаться ходячей энциклопедией современной и не очень музыки — его фонотека винила давно уже исчисляется не количеством пластинок
column28: а в весовых единицах - 4 тонны отборного материала со всех уголков земного шара. Мэдлиб не просто собирает записи — он их революционизирует. И тысячи альбомов
column29: втиснутых в трёхкомнатное пространство
column31: а функциональные инструменты огромного оркестра Мэдлиба
column33: как только это понадобится дирижёру. Единственная присущая Мэдлибу константа состоит в том
column34: что
column35: не покладая рук и не смыкая глаз
column36: он постоянно находится в работе. Помешанный на джазе он поглощён непрестанным творческим потоком
column38: что написание новых битов для него — жизненно важный процесс
column39: как прием пищи или дыхание для простых смертных. С ювелирной точностью
column40: изяществом опытного хирурга и маниакальной усердностью обезумевшего профессора
column41: Madlib вычленяет сэмплы из богом забытых мелодий и на их основе сочиняет совершенно новые композиции - всегда виртуозные и сочные
column42:
отчего по праву считается живым классиком современного битмейкинга.
16 октября Madlib выступит в Санкт — Петербурге в А2 при поддержке MC Фредди Гиббса (Freddie Gibbs) и диджея Джея Рокка (J Rocc).
Так же
column43: немаловажным фактом для оценки важности и актуальности этого концерта можно назвать и то
column44: что Madlib едет в Россию впервые
column45: и возможно — это единственный концерт здесь

который стоит у него в планах на ближайшие годы.

For System Of A Down
column5: the upcoming trek represents their first extended U.S. tour since reuniting last year -- in 2011
column6: SOAD played a handful of West Coast dates in between shows in Europe and South America. While fans anxiously await System's first album since 2005's \"\"Hypnotize
column7: \"\" frontman Serj Tankian will release his third solo effort
column8: \"\"Harakiri
column9:
\"\" on July 10 on Reprise Records/Serjical Strike.
Meanwhile
column10: Deftones are currently banging out their seventh album in Los Angeles with producer Nick Raskulinecz
column11: and hope to finish the effort for release later this year. Their previous full-length
column13: \"\" has sold 228
column14: 000 copies
column15: according to Nielsen SoundScan. "

Birmingham Promoters present:
Pond + Swim Deep + The Carpels DJ Set
Sun 20th May @ Hare & Hounds
Tickets available from http://bit.ly/95LEUq
******************************
POND
Pond is an Australian outfit led by two core members of Tame Impala
column5: and featuring members from Mink Mussel Creek
column6: The Growl and The Silents. The idea of Pond was to be able to get anyone they wanted to play whatever
column7: whenever
column8: in a completely ego free kind of trip all under the big obligation-less blanket of “Pond”. This resulted in the album ‘Corridors of Blissterday’ being recorded live with an 8-piece band in 5 days sometime in 2009. Their latest album
column9: ‘Beard
column10: Wives
column11: Denim’
column12: was recorded in a farm down south of Perth
column13:
Western Australia. The fine folks at Modular Records thought it was such a great record they decided to release it worldwide and with a great amount of fuss in March 2012.
“…quite possibly the best album released so far this year.” – 9/10
column14:
NME
http://www.facebook.com/pondling
******************************
SWIM DEEP
Swim Deep are Austin
column15: Thomas and Zack. These three lads from Birmingham
column16: and surrounding areas
column17:
blend a range of influences from The Cure to Small Black to Surfer Blood. Their debut single 'King City' / 'Beach Justice' is released on 14th May via Chess Club Records.
Check out the video for 'King City':
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ATxs0N_DFTw
http://soundcloud.com/swimdeep
******************************
THE CARPELS DJ SET
The Carpels have tunes that'll make you book a health assessment for your dancing legs. Imagine the voice of Ian Curtis over a Spiderman-quilt covered bed of Klaxons-esque new wave synth-slash-guitar pop.
“Riffs are rough
column18: the pace frenetic
column19:
and the live show…is nothing short of powerful” – After The Deadline
“When listening to and watching The Carpels
column20:
you get a real sense of a young band on the cusp of something really big.” - More Than Music
http://www.facebook.com/TheCarpels
******************************
Tickets available from http://bit.ly/95LEUq & HMV Ticket Outlets
Doors: 7:00pm
Ages: 18+
More info: http://birminghampromoters.com/ "

Saturday 7th April 2012
At The Hydrant
75 London Road
Brighton
BN1 4JF
http://thehydrantbrighton.co.uk/
Johnny Moped + Monkish + Anal Beard + Skurvi + Heavy Load
Doors 7:30pm
Only £8
Just a quick update to say that tickets are now on sale for this event for £8 and can be purchased from
http://thehydrantbrighton.co.uk/bookings
UPDATE - 14TH MARCH 2012...
Tickets have been on sale for just over a day and over 10% of them have gone already. This looks like being the only Johnny Moped gig worldwide in 2012 so don't miss out.
The timings for the gig are also confirmed. Johnny Moped will be finished by 11:15 so anyone who needs to get the last train from Brighton should have plenty of time to make it back to the station.
8:00-8:30 Heavy Load
8:45-9:15 Anal Beard
9:30-10:00 Monkish
10:15-11:15 Johnny Moped
11:30-late Skurvi (late set)

LADO W MIEŚCIE 2012 to kolejna odsłona jedynego w swoim rodzaju, wakacyjnego cyklu koncertowego, będącego subiektywnym przeglądem tego co najświeższe i najciekawsze na tzw. scenie niezależnej w Polsce. Usłyszycie więc całkiem nowe projekty, znane i lubiane zespoły prezentujące nowy materiał lub takie które po prostu jeszcze na Lado w Mieście nie grały, a zdecydowanie powinny. Tradycyjnie pojawią się tez goście z zagranicy.
Miejscem tegorocznego Lado w Mieście będzie BarKa – zacumowana na Wiśle, w centrum Warszawy, pływająca scena i klubokawiarnia, będąca sezonową filią Planu B i Powiększenia.
Koncerty odbywać się będą we czwartki od 12 lipca do 6 września, o godz. 21.
Lokalizacja: BarKa (512 kilometr Wisły, obok budowy stacji metra / na wysokości ul. Wybrzeże Kościuszkowskie 31/33 )
W razie kiepskiej pogody przenosimy się do Powiększenia.
Wstęp na wszystkie wydarzenia darmowy.
PROGRAM:
Lipiec:
12.07 Ścianka / Michał Biela solo
19.07 SzaZaZe plays Themerson / Pictorial Candi
26.07 Coldair / Woody Alien
Sierpień:
2.08 The Kurws / Alte Zachen - premiera plyty Total ג
9.08 Jozef Van Wissem / Father Murphy
16.08 Hokei / Jacek Sienkiewicz
23.08 Piętnastka / Szuszkiewicz i Muzycy
30.08 Jacaszek / Alameda Trio
Wrzesień:
6.09 Marcin Masecki - premiera plyty Kunst Der Fuge / LXMP with Chad
Popple & Kazuhisa Uchihashi - premiera płyt: \\"The Lost Tuba\"\" i
\"\"Broken Strings\"\" "

Opeth and Mastodon has been moved to Showbox SoDo. All tickets from the previously scheduled appearance at the Paramount Theatre will be honored.
The show is now all General Admission.
The band's roots in the doom-laden shade of occult-infused Scandinavian death metal and dark romanticism are undeniable and will never elicit apology. But the transcendent emotional and melodic heights achieved on the brilliantly titled tenth full-length Opeth album, Heritage, marks a new chapter in the storied quintet's career. Band leader, singer, guitarist, songwriter and long-running consistent member Mikael Åkerfeldt has reshaped the pathway forward for his artistic vehicle without sacrificing the hard won spiritualism of previous endeavors.
\\"I’ve become synonymous with Opeth
column5: \"\" he says
column6:
acknowledging his dedication to perfectionism and his studied decision making regarding the group's methodical and deliberate shifts. \"\"I’ve been writing the material since the first album. I’ve been steering the ship for many years now and I’m quite comfortable. It’s something that I created and the people that have been in Opeth with me have helped make this into a very special band.\"\"

Off-Schumann-Visionen und fantasievolle Grenzüberschreiter– curated by Hauschka, Pianist, Komponist, Arrangeur, Elektroniker und Experimentator.
OWEN PALLETT VIOLINE
HAUSCHKA KLAVIER UND ELECTRONICS
ÓLÖF ARNALDS
U.A.
OFF-SCHUMANN-VISIONEN CURATED BY HAUSCHKA
Der Düsseldorfer Pianist und Komponist Volker Bertelmann ist unter seinem Künstlernamen Hauschka international gefragt als Improvisationskünstler und experimenteller Schöpfer fragiler Pianomusik am präparierten Klavier. Ausgehend von der atmosphärischen Welt Schumanns, „von der Stimmung, aus der heraus Schumann gearbeitet hat“, hat er sich nun gefragt: Wie klingt Sehnsucht heute? Bei dem von ihm kuratierten dreiteiligen Konzert „The New Romantics” wird er gemeinsam mit anderen avantgardistischen Klangexperimentatoren der Schumannschen Empfindungswelt zeitgenössische Pendants, ,,ein ganz eigenes Genre“, zur Seite stellen.
Der Abend wird eröffnet von der jungen isländischen Sängerin und Multi-Instrumentalistin Ólöf Arnalds. „Irgendwo zwischen einem Kind und einer alten Dame” schwebt ihre Stimme, die häufig mit Björk verglichen wird. Klassisch auf der Geige ausgebildet, brachte Arnalds sich selbst das Spielen auf der Bratsche, Gitarre und dem Charango bei. Ihr Zugang zur Musik ist dennoch höchst individuell, verspielt und intim, zugleich mit einer zeitlosen Mystik versehen, die über die koboldhafte Unergründbarkeit ihrer Heimat hinausweist. Die New York Times beschreibt ihre Stimme als „hoch und klar, mit einem sanften Beben das ihre jenseitige Reinheit menschlich macht”.
Anschließend wird uns Hauschka gemeinsam mit dem finnischen Schlagzeuger Samuli Kosminen in eines seiner typischen Improvisations-Abenteuer für präpariertes Klavier und Schlagzeug entführen. Bei den melancholischen Miniaturen zwischen Weltschmerz und Daseinsbejahung, kombiniert mit den elektronischen Loops und Sounds von Kosminen, entstehen Stimmungen und zerfallen gleich wieder.
Ebenfalls für melancholischen Weltschmerz bekannt und für seine einzigartigen Grenzgänge zwischen Kammermusik und Rock, Klassik, Pop und zarter Elektronik ist der kanadische Pop-Star, „Zaubergeiger“ und Sänger Owen Pallett. Über eine fußbetriebene Loop Station kann er seine Violinklänge übereinanderschichten und zeitverzögert abspielen. Daraus entstehen berückend schöne, fein gesponnene Songs. Oszillierend zwischen sanftem Charmieren, Rätselhaftigkeit und dynamisch-dramatischem Aufbegehren, werden sie von einem klassischen Streichquartett begleitet.
€ 19,- / 27,- / 39,-
TELEFONISCHER VORVERKAUF & RESERVIERUNGEN
0211 . 89 96 123 Tonhalle
(Mo–Fr 10–19 Uhr, Sa 10–14 Uhr)
0211 . 27 4000 westticket
(Mo–Fr 8–20 Uhr, Sa 9–18 Uhr, So & Feiertags 10–16 Uhr)
Weitere Informationen unter www.schumannfest.de "

column5: Maria Antonietta
column6: al secolo Letizia Cesarini
column7: nasce a Pesaro e racconta lo schianto di avere vent' anni. Un’attitudine assolutamente punk
column8: al servizio di una scrittura scabra
column9: rugginosa
column10: confessionale e fortemente femminile. Quel che serve insomma. Rude e inattesa come come uno schiaffo in pieno volto
column11: e poi improvvisamente leggera e melodiosa come la nostra bella canzone italiana. Il tutto senza filtro e con un talento descrittivo fuori dalle righe
column12: Maria Antonietta racconta la giovinezza con un fragore generazionale che non lascia via di fuga. Urla e sussurra
column13: Maria Antonietta
column14: e ti tiene lì
column15: legato al filo del suo immaginario nitido e potentissimo
column16: fatto di fascinazione per l'universo sacro e di icone sante come ultimo baluardo di purezza incontaminata
column17: di compulsioni e amori carnali senza condizioni. L' esordio in italiano per Picicca Dischi (registrato e prodotto da Dario Brunori)
column18: in uscita nel giorno dei natali di Giovanna d'Arco
column19: la pucelle d'Orleans
column20: è di un'urgenza dannata: massima brevità
column21:
quasi fossero.
MARCELLO E IL MIO AMICO TOMMASO
Marcello e il mio amico Tommaso sono in quattro - avete qualcosa in contrario? - e arrivano da Roma.
Una piccolissima orchestra pop da cameretta - violoncello
column22: oboe
column23: chitarra acustica
column24: batteria
column25: xilofono e due voci - cresciuta con il santino di Stephin Merritt nel portafoglio
column26: una passione per le storie sbilenche degna del miglior Adam Green e un gusto per gli arrangiamenti dal sapore classico
column27:
ma immediato.
C'è Marcello che è alto alto e
column28: quando non suona la chitarra elettrica nei Jacqueries
column29: si trasforma in crooner romantico
column30:
ma in un modo tutto suo.
A fargli compagnia
column32:
il suo amico Tommaso. Violoncellista nell'orchestra del Teatro dell'Opera di Roma e nel Niabla Ensemble.
Sempre dalla musica classica arriva anche Gianlorenzo
column33: anche lui nell'orchestra del Teatro dell'Opera di Roma
column34: ma in veste di oboista (uno strumento sicuramente meno pesante del violoncello
column35: ma altrettanto difficile da suonare). Poi c'è Margherita
column36: che quando non recita in film
column38: vince un sacco di premi e occupa famosi teatri di Roma
column39: si siede dietro i tamburi e canta suonando la batteria. Come Phil Collins
column40:
ma con un taglio di capelli migliore.
\"\"Chounette\"\" è il loro primo EP
column41: arriva alla fine dell'estate
column42: quando le foglie cominciano a cadere e i bambini tornano a scuola. "

Depois do sucesso das apresentações em São Paulo, Curitiba e Belo Horizonte, o cantor, compositor e multi-instrumentista Marcelo Camelo
column5: se dedica nos próximos meses de agosto e setembro
column6: para fazer o seu show especial no formato voz e violão. O repertório inclui músicas suas gravadas por outros intérpretes renomados como Maria Rita
column7: Erasmo Carlos
column8: Roberta Sá e Ivete Sangalo. Não ficam de fora músicas da antiga banda e da carreira individual de Camelo. Em comum
column9:
todas as canções são apresentadas em roupagem inédita e com a participação especial de um músico convidado.
\"\"Estou muito feliz de poder tocar neste formato”
column10: diz Marcelo Camelo. “Para mim
column11: vai ser muito desafiador em certo sentido
column12: porque sempre construí minha obra baseado na instrumentação inteira
column13: nas bandas com quem estive. Poder apresentar as músicas do jeito que elas nasceram
column14: mais próximo possível de um formato unitário
column15:
me deixa muito animado.”
Marcelo Camelo transita entre estilos diversos
column16: como MPB
column17: rock e pop. Na década de 90 e 2000
column18: fez muito sucesso como vocalista e guitarrista da banda Los Hermanos
column19: com a qual gravou quatro discos (Los Hermanos
column20: Bloco do Eu Sozinho
column21: Ventura e 4). Em 2008
column22: ele lançou seu primeiro disco solo
column23: Sou. Já em abril de 2011
column24: Marcelo lançou o seu segundo álbum solo
column26: em que nove das dez faixas foram compostas por ele. "

Superstars Kanye West and JAY Z's collaboration ‘The Throne' will bring the WATCH THE THRONE tour to The O2 arena on Sunday 20 May 2012 as their only London date.
The longtime friends and music innovators inspired each other to new heights with their collaboration on WATCH THE THRONE recorded in person at various locations around the world. Over a year in the making and a truly global affair, the duo recorded in London and Bath in the UK, Abu Dhabi, Sydney, Paris, and New York City. The album features production from The RZA, The Neptunes and Kanye's longtime collaborator Mike Dean. The short list of featured vocals includes Frank Ocean, Beyoncé, Curtis Mayfield and Mr. Hudson. The lead track, \\"OTIS
column5:
\"\" brilliantly weaves Otis Redding's \"\"Try A Little Tenderness.
Both JAY Z and Kanye West have each appeared as guests on the other's stage
column6: and now they come together for never-before-seen performances not only from their collaboration
column7: WATCH THE THRONE but also songs from their classic catalogue. "

column4: Viisinkertainen Grammy-voittaja Lady Gaga on valmis tekemään voittoisan paluun lavoille tänä vuonna The Born This Way Ball -kiertueella. Uudella kiertueellaan Gaga esittää tuoreimman levynsä ”Born This Wayn” sekä musiikkia sekä ”The Fame”- että ”The Fame Monster” -levyiltä. Live Nationin tuottama The Born This Way Ball käynnistyy huhtikuun lopulla Etelä-Koreasta ja kevään kiertuelippujen kysyntä Aasiassa ja Australiassa on ollut äärimmäisen kiivasta. Tänään The Born This Way Ballille on julkistettu myös 21 Euroopan-keikkaa ja yksi niistä toteutuu Hartwall Areenalla, Helsingissä, maanantaina 27. elokuuta. Helsingin-konsertin lipunmyynti käynnistyy maanantaina 16. huhtikuuta.

Über 15 Jahre hinweg hatten die schwer einflußreichen Black Dice immer wieder einen neuen Entwurf für Punk parat. Das aus Eric Copeland, Bjorn Copeland, und Aaron Warren Trio aus Brooklyn veröffentlichten ihre Innovationen, von rohem brutalem Thrash bis hin zu zuckersüßen Pop-Hymnen auf so illustren Labels wie Gravity, 31g, Troubleman, DFA, und Paw Tracks.
Im Laufe dieser Zeit wurden die Verstärker größer und die Instrumente mysteriöser. Drums und Bass-Gitarren wurden durch mixer feedback und befremdlich anmutende Vocals und Sounds ersetzt.
Mr.Impossible (Ribbon Music) is das sechtse Studioalbum der Band und wagt sich auf unerforschtes Terrain. Primitivismus, das außerirdische Pochen von Funkadelic und die disharmonische Rebellion von Royal Trux vereinen sich zusammen zu einer neuen Mutation namens Mr.Impossible.
blackdice.net
www.ribbonmusic.com

column4:
Dopo quasi 30 anni dal loro ultimo concerto a Bologna, tornano i Confusional Quartet con la loro formazione originale, una delle band più innovative che si siano mai viste nel nostro paese. Dopo di loro dj set dei fantastici Shitdisco!
Confusional Quartet
(Bologna – nowave pioniers)
Preparatevi per un live act bruciante, un’ora di energia allo stato puro per un quartetto fuori da ogni moda o schema musicale. Base ritmica poderosa, intrecci di synth e chitarre irriverenti e atonali, richiami a tradizione italica e futurismo, minimalismo e ironia. Questo il mix della musica che il gruppo bolognese propone dopo trent’anni di silenzio musicale. Come allora, quattro marziani scesi sulla terra per presentare una musica senza parole, senza intrattenimento.
Dopo una breve stagione all’inizio degli anni ’80 ed una manciata di dischi introvabili (ripubblicati nel 1999 e nel 2010) i quattro, nella formazione originale, si rimettono a suonare insieme e producono un Cd concept sperimentale – ITALIA CALIBRO X – in collaborazione con Gianni Gitti (Ansaldi Records) ed un Cd di inediti che uscirà in primavera mixato da Giulio Ragno Favero con un brano scritto insieme a Sir Cornelius Bob Rifo aka The Bloody Beetroots dove, ascoltandoli e comparandoli, si ha esattamente il quadro di cosa intendano i quattro per musica: sperimentazione e razionalità, improvvisazione e scrittura rigida, riflessione ed azione.
Durante il concerto verranno proposti tutti i brani inediti e soltanto quattro o cinque vecchie canzoni per ribadire, ce ne fosse bisogno, che il Confusional Quartet prosegue nella ricerca di nuove sonorità e situazioni musicali, in barba alle reunion nostalgiche.
special guest
SHITDISCO Dj Set
(UK – discopunk – Fierce Panda)
Gli Shitdisco sono un gruppo di Glasgow. Nati nel 2003, sono considerati, insieme ai Klaxons, i pionieri del nuovo genere che unisce sonorità disco, punk-rock e musica elettronica, definito New Rave. I primi due singoli, “Disco Blood” e “I Know Kung Fu” sono stati pubblicati nel dicembre 2005 e, dato il loro successo, hanno spinto la band a firmare un contratto con l’etichetta indipendente Fierce Panda Records. Il 16 aprile 2007 è uscito l’album del debutto sulla scena internazionale, Kingdom of Fear che, nella prima settimana, ha raggiunto il quarto posto nella classifica inglese degli album indie più venduti.
La campagna pubblicitaria 2008 della nota marca di birra Ceres, intitolata The True Heads, li vede come testimonial. Nello spot, la band si esibisce in una performance on stage della canzone “I Know Kung Fu”, davanti ad un pubblico di accaniti fan le loro teste sono tuttavia sostituite da una riproduzione in 3D. Il 23 settembre 2008 è uscito il secondo album di studio del gruppo, The Emanator, pubblicato solo per il mercato statunitense sull’etichetta di Steve Aoki, la Dim Mak Records.
Gli Shitdisco oggi non esistono più come band, ma proseguono la propria carriera infiammando i dancefloors di tutto il mondo con i loro clamorosi djsets. Due membri della band hanno formato un nuovo progetto, Age of Consent (live e dj set), di cui è in procinto di pubblicazione il primo singolo.
Ingresso concerto: 10 euro
Dopo il concerto: 7 euro, 5 in lista riduzione Tessera stagione 2011/12 HOVOC obbligatoria
Per riduzione post concerto scrivere il proprio nome, cognome e data cui si vuole partecipare a liste@covoclub.it
Apertura ore 22

column4:
Rock luminary JACK WHITE will be performing two headline shows in Melbourne and Sydney this July to showcase material from his much anticipated solo debut Blunderbuss (out 20 April through Sony).
Undoubtedly one of the world’s most prolific artists to emerge in the past fifteen years, Jack White has helmed some of the world’s most venerable musical outfits including The White Stripes, The Raconteurs and The Dead Weather.
The multitalented musician, eminent producer and successful label owner has taken home nine Grammys in seven different categories, proving his versatility and prowess within all endeavours. Blunderbuss is no exception.
The first single ‘Love Interruption’ from his most recent endeavour was quickly devoured and doted upon, as was follow up track ‘Sixteen Saltines’, leaving critics and fans hungry for more:
“Reminiscent of deeper cuts on the last few White Stripes albums, \\"Love Interruption\"\" is an unusual but tantalizing lead track... Like the recent material from his other bands - and its title -- \"\"Love Interruption\"\" leaves you lusting for more.” – BILLBOARD
“...This project is designed to be bigger than anything he's done since the Stripes. Even more importantly than this
column5:
I've heard it three times and I can't get a second of it out of my head.” – NME
Jack White’s live show only adds to the sense of awe and reverence felt toward the Nashville resident. Those who made it into the showcase of White’s label Third Man Records during SXSW were treated to revamped hits as well as new material
column6:
all of which Australian fans can look forward to:
“What could have been White simply showcasing his new songs turned into a two-part
column7: two-hour party featuring several White Stripes classics as well as tunes from his other projects the Raconteurs and his cinematic Danger Mouse/Daneile Luppi collaboration
column8: Rome....proving yet again that he's an able
column9:
commanding helmsman no matter what ship he's steering.” – VARIETY
“A 90-minute set
column10: which was easily the best live performance this writer has ever seen him play (White Stripes
column11: Raconteurs
column12: and Dead Weather all included)...Each song exploded to form a dazzling wall of sound
column13:
a level of intensity and vigor and perfection obtained by only the greats.” – CONSEQUENCE OF SOUND
Australia’s favourite rockabilly darling LANIE LANE will be joining Jack White on tour
column14:
having received his endorsement in the early stages of her career when she took him up on his offer to produce and release the single ‘Aint Hungry’ for Third Man Records.
Lanie Lane has since performed sold out shows of her own across the country and her debut album To The Horses (out now through Ivy League) has gained her devoted fans of her own upon its release late last year. "

column4:
Quem diz que um sumo com muita fruta não sabe bem? Oriundos de Sacramento, Califórnia, Tera Melos praticam uma sonoridade que vai beber a variadíssimos estilos de Rock, Jazz e ambientes electrónicos tendo como resultado uma composição bastante invulgar e inovadora no estilo Math-Rock. Por vezes encontramos pontos comuns com Hella, coincidentemente o Guitarrista Nick Reinhart partilha a banda Bygones com o colossal Zach Hill.
Este trio conta com um vasto currículo tendo partilhado tournées com bandas como Boris, Russian Circles, Melt Banana, Marnie Stern...
A marcar presença em Portugal pela primeira vez, Tera Melos partilharão a noite de dia 23 de Maio com Savanna e Eating Thünder.
Savanna vêm assim ao porto pela primeira vez apresentar o seu EP de estreia \\"Aurora\"\"
Eating Thünder
column5: banda formada por membros dos cada vez mais aclamados Equations vão mostrar-nos como é possível invocar o Demo com

column7:

Уже 10 лет, группа JANE AIR выходит 1 января на сцену родного клуба Молоко aka Цоколь.
Не взирая на похмелье алкогольное, наркотическое, пургу, гололёд, голод в стране и прочие катаклизмы, парни мужественно шагают на сцену маленького клуба, ставшего для них альма-матерью.
Как волчица вскормила Рема и Ромула, которые впоследствии основали Рим, Молоко приютило их в далёком 2001 и вынесло тот напор юношеского энтузиазма, с которым JANE AIR начали свой тернистый, но интересный путь!
Этот 2012 год не только не станет исключением, но и станет для нас юбилейным.
Был всего один год, когда Молоко уже закрылось, а Цоколь ещё не сделали, так что в этом году у нас НАСТОЯЩЕЕ ДЕСЯТИЛЕТИЕ!
ИТАК! JANE AIR ПРЕДСТАВЛЯЕТ:
10 ЮБИЛЕЙНЫЙ НОВОГОДНИЙ КОНЦЕРТ!
JANE AIR ОТЫГРАЕТ ЭЛЕКТРИЧЕСКИЙ 2-х часовой КОНЦЕРТ!
Вход в клуб открыт с 19:00
Начало концерта в 20:00

The Rockingbirds The short version of The Rockingbirds saga is that they released two acclaimed albums in the early 90s on the hip Heavenly label. They anticipated the alt-country revolution and sat comfortably alongside like-minded contemporaries like The Jayhawks and Uncle Tupelo. But, The Rockingbirds effectively burned out due to an over-enthusiastic lifestyle and imploded.  Reforming for their label, Heavenly Recordings, 18th birthday festival in London in 2008, The Rockingbirds played to packed Southbank audience. Since then the band’s first album has been re-mastered and re-released, and more live dates and fresh recording sessions are ensuing as The Rockingbirds try their method on a new generation. A new 7″ single “Till Something Better Comes Along” was released in December 2011 on Spring Records, and a new album is planned for 2012. To echo a line from their song Gradually Learning, being late is better than never.
support from Americana / Folk / Rock duo The Arlenes
The Arlenes are back in the UK after a 9 year ramble through the United States, from California to Nashville, TN. They sing close harmony acoustic music with a folk/country leaning, and have new album recorded in Tennessee for Loose Music. Friends of the Rockingbirds since the beginnings in Camden Town, The Arlenes are really looking forward to doing a few shows together again.

OTO favourite Josephine Foster is back for two nights with a full band on the back of her new album ‘Blood Rushing’ (Fire Records). Another welcome opportunity to experience Foster’s magnificent voice, swooping and swaying through the melodic arrangements (Morriconeon in their power and imagination) of her band. Some songs are singalongs, some are deep atmospheric tales that leave the listener yearning to know more. American gothic, breathless folk and mountain music are all drawn upon by the band but boy ‘o’ boy, do they swing and swing, with Spanish guitar maestro Victor Herrero channelling all kinds of colour and texture into proceedings. At the heart of the fulsome live sound which also features Trembling Bells’ Alex Neilson on drums and Paz Lenchantin from the Entrance Band on bass/violin will be Foster’s voice, evoking the nostalgic warmth and beauty of a phonograph.
‘Blood Rushing’ is an album that breathes new life into this old world: a celebration of myth making, with ancient images and themes of love, deserts and fire coursing through it like a river. A story within a story, the album is a glimpse into the world of Blushing, a heteronym of the artist Josephine Foster. A rock-ballet chante, the music is set to the meta-pulsing Pan— American heartbeat of the Pueblo drum. Recorded in Colorado by Andrija Tokic (Alabama Shakes) with the collaboration of her partner Victor Herrero, musical guests include Paz Lenchantin (The Entrance Band), Heather Trost (A Hawk and a Hacksaw) and Ben Trimble (Fly Golden Eagle).

column21: que no pueden vivir sin la costa portuguesa

column23: con diferentes sonidos
